definition: leftover agricultural plastic (as waste or rubbish that needs to be disposed of or recycled)
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

sentences.english: Conclusion Large-scale congenital persistent pupillary membrane can be treated by microsurgery.
sentences.chinese: 結論較大範圍的先天性瞳孔殘膜可應用顯微手術治療。

sentences.english: A new type of cotton stalk shredding and used polythene film collecting combined machine was developed and designed.
sentences.chinese: 摘要研製了棉秸稈切碎及殘膜回收聯合作業機。
